A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved the film. Very entertaining. Seems the bad reviews come from people who thought their theories were going to be right and Johnson did something totally different. The only problem I have with the new trilogy so far is that they squandered showing the original 3 characters together. They should have had a moment between Han & Luke in The Force Awakens. Anyone that says this movie is worse than the prequels clearly has zero taste.
